page.title: 03Housing Estates in Knowle
page.content: Since World War 2, suburban housing estates have spread S.W. from Knowle to Dorridge absorbing the former hamlet of Bently Heath. The most recent estates are still being built at Bently Heath where 360, 3 and 4 bedroom, freehold, detached, "luxury" houses are nearing completion at "Knowle Keep" and "Tilehouse Green". The earlier 1960's and 1970's estates were nearer to Knowle and like the more recent estates these were built on former "green field" sites. As most people now own a car, these estates are composed entirely of housing and have no shops or other community facilities. Most of the houses in the area are Â£30,000+.
